text: @AOC Unless u are going 2b helpful & go make some mask,gloves,lysol, disinfectant,tissue or food, just shut the fuck up.U need not tweet if you're going to turn this into a black/brown VS rich whites. #coronavirus is happening in All 50 states,rich,poor,Royalty,Prime Ministers wife.
